name: Generous Welfare System
title: Top Global Subsidy Provider
description: In 2022, Belgium allocated 84.99% of its expenses to subsidies and other transfers, marking it as the highest in the world.

name: Healthcare Heroes
title: Leading in Healthcare Workforce
description: With 20.89 nurses and midwives per 1,000 people in 2022, Belgium boasts one of the highest healthcare worker densities globally.

name: Healthy Kids, Happy Future
title: Lowest Child Malnutrition Rates
description: In 2023, Belgium recorded a mere 0.2% prevalence of underweight among female children under five, and 0.3% overall, showcasing its success in child nutrition.

name: Strong Start for Boys
title: Minimal Wasting in Young Boys
description: Belgium achieved a low prevalence of 0.2% in wasting among male children under five in 2023, reflecting effective child health policies.

name: Empowered Women
title: Minimal Child Marriage
description: In 2020, only 0.1% of Belgian women aged 20-24 were married by age 18, indicating strong societal norms against child marriage.
